name: shopify-webhook-function
description: Cloud Function to handle Shopify webhook messages

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy shopify-webhook-handler --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-topic shopify-webhooks --entry-point shopifyWebhookHandler --set-env-vars MAIN_APP_WEBHOOK_URL=https://pavlo4.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/track-event,MAIN_APP_API_KEY=16272754ed68cbdcb55e8f579703d92e
